name: Scybot Coin Counter
description:
Do you have a huge pile of coins waiting to be counted?  Then this app is for you.  Group the coins by type, point the camera at each group, and let the app do the counting!

Even if you lack a huge pile of coins, this is still a cool app for showing off your iOS device to friends!

Disclaimer: To be absolutely clear, this app does not identify your coins.  You have to tell it what type of coins it is looking at.  Think of it more as an advanced coin tallying app.

This app works by using image recognition libraries from the OpenCV project to detect circular objects in the camera's view.  The circle detection sensitivity can be adjusted with a single slider.  A convenient user interface assists in tallying the sum of the coins.

Detailed Instructions:

1. Download this app.

2. Separate your pile of coins.

3. Spread the coins out in each group so that no coins are on top of each other, and so that the groups are clearly separated.

4. Start the app.

5. Point the camera at one group such that only that group is visible on the screen.

6. Adjust the detection sensitivity slider until green circles are placed around every coin in the group, and no extra circles appear anywhere else.

7. The app's image processing algorithms automatically self-calibrate based on the current lighting and focus to identify the coins.  It displays the number of coins it counts in the bottom right hand corner.

8. When the number of coins stabilizes, select the coin type and click add.

9. The dollar amount corresponding to the number of coins is added to the total.

By downloading and/or using this apps, the user agrees to the app store End User License Agreements, as well as the Terms and Conditions Listed in the app's info screen and in this document.

Tips:

- Place the coins on a solid background, like a blank white sheet of paper, for best results.

- Make sure the coin detection area is well-illuminated.

- For obtaining more accurate counts, make sure that none of the green circles are flickering, and that there are no extra green circles.  The sensitivity slider, lighting, and background all influence accuracy.

Usage Terms and Conditions:

THIS SOFTWARE AND DOCUMENTATION IS PROVIDED "AS IS," AND COPYRIGHT HOLDERS MAKE NO REPRESENTATIONS OR WARRANTIES, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO, WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY OR FITNESS FOR ANY PARTICULAR PURPOSE OR THAT THE USE OF THE SOFTWARE OR DOCUMENTATION WILL NOT INFRINGE ANY THIRD PARTY PATENTS, COPYRIGHTS, TRADEMARKS OR OTHER RIGHTS.

MyChange Counter is an electronic USD coin counter that makes it easy to keep track of your spare change.  Now you'll know exactly how much spare change you have without the headache of manually counting it all out.  Save for a rainy day or open the app to see if you have enough for laundry or your morning coffee.  Mychange saves you time and money!

name: Photo Coin Counter (Photocoin)
description:
Calculate the total money in a pile of mixed coins by taking a photo of them with Photocoin! 

Photocoin recognizes USA's pennies, nickels, dimes and quarters.

name: Coin Counter
description: This is a great app to teach your kids how to count coins. Each time it will show coins with different combination of penny, nickle, dime and quarter. Kids has to do the math to get the actually amount of money. It is a fun way to learn how to count coins!

name: Coin Counter- A Simple Change Counting App
description: Coin Counter is a simple USD change counting app. You simply type in how many pennies, nickels, dimes, and quarters you have and you are done!

name: Cashculator - Cash Counter
description:
Having a hard time counting your cash?

This is a must have app if you are a cashier or need an easier and accurate calculator specially built for counting your cash!

Counts bills, coins, and coin rolls! Just enter the amount for each denomination and the app does the calculations. Easily find and fix errors if you make a mistake.

Notification Center Widget makes it easy to quickly view totals.

Requires iOS 7.0 or later.

Comments and suggestions are welcome.

name: Coin Counting Calculator
description:
Eliminate confusion when calculating coins by using the Coin Counting Calculator. The popular Coin Counting Calculator uses realistic coin buttons for the penny, nickel, dime, quarter, and half dollar. The Coin Counting Calculator has a display with the cent sign (¢), dollar sign ($), and 2-digit decimals. When the coin buttons are pushed, they add their money value to the amount at the top of the screen based upon the number of times they are pushed. 

The count for each coin is updated underneath each coin image. Additionally, you can press the coin count underneath each coin and a convenient message box will prompt you to enter in specific coin count. 

The Coin Counting Calculator can be used to count money and teach coin values. You can set the function of the calculator to add or subtract.

name: iPocketChange: ¢ Coin Tracker
description:
iPocketChange is a new and useful way to keep track of your coins.

Do you have any coins in your pocket?

KEY FEATURES:

* Saves the quantity of each coin that exists in your wallet.
* Tells you whether you can pay for something with exact change.
* Automatically subtracts the amount you're paying from what you have.
* Saves you money by keeping track of your coins and helping you to utilize them.

THE PROBLEM:

A Subway sandwich is $5.41, including tax. You have six $1 bills, 1 quarter, 1 dime, 1 nickel, and 4 pennies. What would you give the cashier? If this question takes you more than 10 seconds to answer, stop fussing. Use iPocketChange, and save yourself the time and hassle.

You do these kinds of transactions every day. Eventually, we each have an enormous jar of coins. It's a hassle to count and wrap the coins, and it costs money to pay a machine to count them. iPocketChange is the solution. It keeps track of your change at the touch of a finger.

WHY I USE IT:

I have a bunch of coins in my wallet right now. Although I know there are coins in there, I have no idea which coins. It turns out that I have 6 quarters, 4 dimes, 1 nickel, and 1 penny. But once I dump these back in my wallet, I'll have no recollection of how many that was. All I'll know is: "I have a bunch of coins in my wallet."

USAGE SCENARIO:

iPocketChange tracks the change you get, as you get it. When you pay for something with cash, you get a few coins back. Take out your iPhone or iPod touch, open iPocketChange, and tap the coins you just received. Sleep your device, and you're done. It's quick and easy. The app saves the information automatically, and now it knows what's in your wallet-- or purse, or whatever.

Now here's the cool part. The next time you go to buy something, let's say the total is $8.58. Normally, you'd have no idea whether you need to pay $9 and get change, or if you have the right coins to pay for it exactly. Pull out your iPhone or iPod touch, and on iPocketChange's first screen, there's a sliding wheel for selecting the cents part of the item's cost. Scroll to 58, and the app will tell you whether you have exact change, based on what it knows is in your wallet. Let's say you have exact change. Tap "Pay", and the app automatically subtracts from your wallet's contents 2 quarters, 1 nickel, and 3 pennies-- 58 cents. Sleep the device, and pull out your wallet. You can be confident that you have the right coins to make exact change.

FUN EXTRAS:

* Original photos taken with a professional digital SLR camera.
* Coin sound.
* Accelerometer support: move the coins around the screen!

iPocketChange currently supports only U.S. currency, but if you're interested, we may add support for other currencies.

Developed at USC, the University of Southern California
Published by GreenGar Studios
Formerly Gengar Studios

description:

Add 10ps 
Add 20ps 
Add 50ps 
Add £1's 

Coin Jar Counter tracks the rest. 


** Look after then pennies, and the pounds take care of themselves!! **

name: D.Counter
description:
==無料化==

カードゲームで厄介なライフポイント計算を簡単に!

iPadとiPhoneのユニバーサルアプリです!

iPad版では大きくライフを表示し二人分の操作が簡単にできます!

name: Simple Cash Counter
description:
Simple Money Counter was designed to make balancing a till or cash box as easy as possible. All you have to do is count the number of items you have and enter them into the appropriate boxes.

Tapping outside any of the boxes will hide the keyboard and immediately calculate the
running totals. The total amount of money is then displayed nice, neat,
and easy to read under each category, as well as in the separate Totals section at the bottom.

If you are interested in knowing your total profits, the default starting amount is 100, but by changing the value of the "Starting Amount" box in the Totals section, your profits can be  based on any whole or fractional dollar amount. If you are counting an old jar of change, set the "Starting Amount" to 0, or just look at the "Grand Totals" line for the amount you have.

name: YGO Counter
description:
YGO Counter is the one and only dedicated score tracking app for Yu-Gi-Oh! on the App Store. It lets you add and subtract life points from up to four players without trying to do the mathematics in your head, it lets you track any number of in-game counters rather than relying on bits of paper, and it also has a built-in dice roller and coin flipper to handle random game events fairly.

Features
========
   - Tracks life points for two players, with an option to allow four players
   - Calculates life points automatically - you just tell it what to add or remove
   - Stores any number of counters
   - Built-in dice roller and coin flipper
   - Built-in calculator so you don't need to quit during a game
   - Designed for Yu Gi Oh but compatible with any similar game
   - Automatically saves game state, so you can pick up where you left off after a phone call

Slick user interface
====================
You want to duel, not think about how an app works, so YGO Counter stays out of your way - the main screen shows you the current scores, and to make a change you just tap on the life points you want to adjust. That's it: no fuss, no clutter and no distracting animations. 

So, don't bother with a generic app that claims to work with all card games under the sun: YGO Counter is optimised for Yu-Gi-Oh and so provides an optimal experience for duelists who want the best.

name: DCalcLT

This is life point calculator for card games.

description:

MTG Life Counter Free Version
-Rotary phone-like life counter
-Large number display
-all life counter base colors unlocked
-a basic MTG themed life counter top and two basic play mats unlocked

If you like the free version but want more features and the ability to customize the background play mat and the life counter tops, buy the MTG Life Counter Full Version. You’ll unlock the following features if you do.

MTG Life Counter Full Version

-all background play mats unlocked (23 in all)
-Companion rotary phone-like poison counter
-Counter rack
-Coin toss feature

description:
Simple bill and coin calculator. 

Languages: French, German, Italian and Spanish
Currencies: $ USD, € Euro, £ Pound



***************************************
Perfect tool for bartender or business
by Former Bartender Sarah

I wish I had this in my bartending days! This app makes it easy to keep track of multiple drawers at once. If you're a business owner, manager, or work in a restaurant, this app is for you. Super user friendly and fun!


***************

Great app to count cash! 
by JamesL22

My tablet based POS doesn't have the function to count the money in the drawer. This app will definitely help as I have multiple POS stations. Thanks!

***************

Drawers review 
by B3@n C0unt3r 

This is an extremely easy to use app for counting and keeping track of the number of coins and bills in your cash register. Give it a try!

***************************************

Have a small business with multiple point of sale cash drawers?

Work in retail? Open/Close stores? 

Sell at trade shows and art festivals?

Have various piggy banks, coin jars or stacks of cash that need counting? 

Drawers is for you!

Create and save multiple 'drawers' to keep each one separate. 

Simply tap on the coin or bill you are counting to increase the amount, or tap on the count number to pull up the number pad to enter a larger number. 

Counting and saving multiple coin jars, drawers or piggy banks couldn't be easier.

name: Count My Coins - The ultimate coin and savings companion
description:
Count My Coins is a super simple app that can be used as a coin counter, coin/savings tracker, currency converter or even a shop spending tracker! It supports multiple currencies including GBP (£), USD ($), EUR (€), DKK (Kr) and AUD ($). 

It never forgets how much money you have in your virtual bank so you can always keep track of your money.

Here's how you can use Count My Coins

Coin counter:

Imagine the scenario: You empty your piggy bank after a good few months of dropping in the odd bit of change and fluff you have in your pocket. The day finally comes when you decide to take it to the bank. You empty the coins out onto your table and slowly move each coin to it's own separate pile, counting in your head as you go. This nearly always leads to losing track of how much money you have and a waste of an afternoon.

With Count My Coins, this is a thing of the past. Simply select the coin and press the screen to increment the amount.

Coin or savings tracker:

Whenever you drop a bit of money into your piggy bank, simply open up the app and tap the amount you have just dropped in. Close the app and forget about it! We remember how much money you had whenever you close the app so you will never lose your data!

Currency converter :

If you change the currency while tracking your coins, you now have the option to convert your current money to the destination currency!

Shop spending tracker:

As you walk round the store, putting things in your basket, simply enter the cost of each item into Count My Coins and when you get to the checkout you can see exactly how much you have spent!

We would love to add more currencies. If we are missing your currency please ask for it in the reviews and we will aim to add it in the next update!

Any feedback, bugs or suggestions please send to http://twitter.com/treeba

name: Cash Calculator - Money Counter
description:
Always know how much money you have. Calculators are not very efficient at counting money. Use this app instead. If you want to know how much money you have in your wallet, your cash drawer, your purse, your bag, or just about anywhere, just fire up this app, choose the currency, and start counting your money.

Just count the different denominations and enter the values in the app. The app presents the sub totals and the totals. The values entered are saved until you tab the reset button.

Show or hide rarely used denominations with just a flick of a switch.

'Cash Calculator' makes counting money super simple and super efficient.

name: Salary Counter
description:
With the Salary Counter app you can always see how much you've been commendable. Just enter your hourly wage, then start the counter and the app shows you how much your wage rises every second.

However, this app is also very useful to compare if you have spent more money over the day then you have earned. For craftsmen, plumber and others who work on a time basis, this app can be very useful. With this application the wage can be billed precisely on second.

Or maybe you want to see how fast your favorite football or tennis Star earns his money in a few minutes? Then this app is just right for you.

Another advantage of this app is that, if the counter was a once started, you can close it without problems or even turn your device off. And the next time you start the app you can still see how much you earned in that period. So the battery runtime of your iPad or iPhone can be significantly extended.

Perhaps you want to know how much money you earn in your sleep?
Or do you just watch me, how your earnings every second rising? 

Then the Salary Counter is the right app for you ;)

name: TallyPad
description:
TallyPad is a feature-rich fully-customizable tally counter for the iPad and iPhone. Just tap or swipe your finger in one of the designated counting areas to add or subtract from the corresponding tally count. 

AppAdvice.com describes TallyPad as the “essential [counting app] for those dealing with multiple tallies and have power user needs.”  http://goo.gl/gurzt

TallyPad is great for just about any counting project:

- Scorekeeping (especially board games like Scrabble)
- Surveys
- Tracking calories or diet points
- Counting money and loose change
- School projects
- Household Projects
- Voting and Informal elections

What makes TallyPad different from all other counting applications is that you can assign customizable values to three different finger gestures. For example, you can set TallyPad to add 1 to the tally count for a single finger tap, 5 for a vertical swipe and 10 for a horizontal swipe. You get to choose the values. Also, you are not limited to whole numbers: Just switch TallyPad to decimal or money mode to add decimal values.

You can assign a multiplier to each counting area. The multipliers are applied to each counting area independent of the values assigned to finger gestures.

TallyPad implements AV Out and AirPlay Mirroring with AppleTV. You can display your tallies on an external screen! This is great for keeping score at sporting events, family game night, or displaying items on a television in the classroom.

Because TallyPad saves all your custom-named tallies, you can keep track of a virtually unlimited number of tallies and come back to them later. You can also assign names to the three tally categories in each tally project. Also, the TallyPad user interface was designed to allow you to add tallies by tapping and swiping without having to look down at the device. This way you can keep your eyes on what you are counting--not on the iPhone or iPad.

And, by popular request, version 4.0 adds more tally areas. The iPad now supports 8 tally areas. And, if you have the iPhone 5, and additional (5th) tally area has been added. Also, landscape orientation support for the iPad is back. The user interface has been redesigned for ease of use. Finally, the TV Out and AirPlay interface has been updated.

***IMPORTANT NOTE***
If the app is crashing after installing the update, please delete the app and reinstall it. You will not be charged for the purchase/update.

name: A+ Talking Money Counter
description:
Finally the easy way to count money at the reach of your palm in your iPhone! 
The concept behind this application is a very simple, yet very useful one! It simply works by adding money for you. To use it just enter how many of each bill or coin you have; and the application adds it all up for you! This may sound like an easy task to do, but when you have a couple of bill and coins in your hand, and don’t feel like keeping count mentally or writing it down… that is when this application comes in hand! 
Also, to make it even more practical, we provide you with the option to send the results via email or create a snapshot to keep for further reference! It’s the perfect tool for keeping your money records!
We are constantly working on this and other applications, please share with us any ideas or suggestions you may have since we are constantly coming up with applications to simplify your life!

name: CamCoin
description:
Do you have a huge pile of coins waiting to be counted? Then this app is for you.

CamCoin provides a fun and productive way to count coins using your phone camera. Simply place coins on a letter-size (8.5x11) paper sheet, point the camera at the sheet, and let the app do the counting!

CamCoin currently supports the following U.S. denomination coins: pennies, nickels, dimes and quarters.

name: My Piggy Bank
description:
Count all of your loose cash or coins and bank account balances quickly and easily-all in one place! 

My Piggy Bank is an easy to use app that can be used as a money counter, savings tracker, currency converter, or spending tracker (perfect for holidays, birthdays, groceries, and shopping sprees!). 

My Piggy Bank also remembers exactly how much money you have when you close out of the app, so there's no need to worry about losing count of your savings.

The built in currency converter fetches the most up-to-date exchange rates over the internet, so you'll always have an accurate conversion of your money. Don't have an internet connection? Don't worry. My Piggy Bank stores the rates locally as well to provide you with a conversion. The app will automatically update the rates as soon as you get an internet connection. Currently supports USD, GBP, AUD, SEK, CAD, EUR, JPY, MXN, CNY, HKD, and CHF.

The simple and easy to use interface makes it a great app for teaching kids and teens the basics of money management.

name: Long Live Capitalism
description:
All hail Capitalism !

Money generators have always been the dream of all mankind.
Today, this dream finally comes true !
Find yourself locked in a room with a coin machine, and start making some cash !
How far will you go ? How will your room look after becoming money-crazed ?

Features :
- Simple one-touch game

name: Money Counting Calculator
description:
Eliminate confusion when calculating coins by using the Money Counting Calculator. The popular Money Counting Calculator uses realistic coin buttons for the penny, nickel, dime, quarter, half dollar, and coin dollar. Additionally, the Money Counting Calculator uses doll buttons for the one-dollar bill, five-dollar bill, ten-dollar bill, twenty-dollar bill, fifty-dollar bill, and the one hundred dollar bill.

The Money Counting Calculator has a display with the cent sign (¢), dollar sign ($), and 2-digit decimals. When a currency button is pushed, they add their money value to the amount at the top of the screen based upon the number of times they are pushed. The count for each currency is updated underneath each currency image. Additionally, you can press the currency count underneath each coin and a convenient message box will prompt you to enter in specific coin count.

The Money Counting Calculator can be used to count money and teach currency values. You can set the function of the calculator to add or subtract. In addition, a convenient toggle button allows you to switch between coins and dollars.

name: Apscade Saver 2
description:
With Apscade Saver 2: Track multiple savings goals!

* Keep track of the amount you have contributed towards three savings goals
* or Record the amount of money you save in your piggy bank, sock or bank account
* or use it to help you stay within budget when shopping

* View statistics on your savings progress (such as percentage)
* Customise the background colour to one of five colours
* Choose from three themes to decorate your screen. 
* Christmas, shopper and beach themes included in this version.
* Change your goal name and amount when necessary
* Switch goals easily
* Choose from three major currencies or use no currency
* Works fine on iOS6 or iOS7 or iOS8 only

This app is a money counter only. It is not a bank account and, cannot be linked to one. Default amounts in the app are shown in dollars ($) but you can change it in EDIT GOAL.

Nothing in this app should be taken as financial advice.

name: MagicGameKit
description: MagicGameKit is a great useful tool to assist players in their card Games, it has a life counter, a virtual dice row, coin flip and a creature token controller.

name: Best Hockey Trivia
description:
Think you know Hockey? Become the ultimate fan with our Hockey trivia app!

We have the best trivia app for Hockey for iPhone and iPad. 

How big a fan are you?  Do you know which team originally drafted Mikael Andersson?  Do you who scored a record 10 hat tricks in an NHL season? What about the first player to captain two different NHL championship teams? Those questions and many more await you in this great trivia app!  


- This trivia app is easy to use. 
No registration required. Start answering questions quickly. Simple to play but difficult enough to keep even seasoned fans coming back for more. 

- Are you stuck? 
No problem we allow you to skip questions and get hints. We give you some for free. Need more you can grab them in the store. Keep on guessing and playing. Try and answer all of our questions to unlock a very special surprise! 

- Get help playing with your friends! 
Whenever you are stuck its easy to ask for help with our built in help button to ask your friends for help. Challenge them to see who is the bigger Hockey fan! 

- Fun, Free & Addictive! 
See if you have what it takes to become a master of Hockey trivia. 

Get Hockey trivia challenge today and see if you have what it takes to be a true fan!

name: Baseball Umpire Pocket Reference
description:
#1 selling tool for Baseball Umpires, is now available as an app for HALF THE COST of the printed version.

Applies to all leagues based on Official Baseball Rules, and playing on a 90' Diamond. (Including NFHS) 

Base Awards: 
We list all the official base awards for Batters and Runners. This list is perfect for new umpires still learning the rules. It's also great for those situations that don't come up very often. 
Included is award timing - 
"Time of Pitch" or "Time of Infraction" 

2 Man Crew Mechanics: 
Learning the mechanics for multiple umpires can be confusing at first. This card tells you where you should be and what your responsibilities are for common situations. Great for reviewing during the Umpire's Pre-Game Meeting. 

Umpire Pre-Game Meeting: 
Know what to review with your partners in your pre-game meeting. 

Pre-Game Plate Meeting: 
A nice checklist of what to cover with the team Coaches at the Plate Meeting. 

Strike Zone: 
Standard descriptions of the Strike Zone, along with a multi-view diagram.

Coin Toss: 
This feature provides a way to toss a virtual coin for determining Home team during tournaments.

Umpire Indicator: 
This feature provides standard Umpire Indicator functionality. The Indicator is designed to be used with either hand. The Indicator also includes 'Score' counters, and a 'Zero All Counters' feature. The counts are stored, so if you switch to another screen or app, the counts will be remembered.

No ads or in app purchases needed.  You get all the content and updates for one price.

name: ChageUp App
description: Connects to the ChangeUp device to count your coins in real time so you know exactly how much we'll be depositing into your bank account. Available as a free download on the App Store and makes counting coins fun!

name: CashOfWorld - automatically calculate the money
description:
The ultimate app CashOfWorld of denomination calculation
It is easy to calculate the major currencies of the world

Corresponding to the major eight currency of the world , it covers the majority of the population on the earth !
- US dollar
- Euro
- British Pound
- Japanese yen
- Chinese Yuan Renminbi
- Russian Ruble
- India Rupee
- Korean Won
※ other currencies , it is scheduled to increase by future updates . 

Denomination of calculation , it is easily and quickly be app .
Travel to foreign countries , the calculation of the money in the calculation of the change of the shop , such as salary calculation , it is active in various scenes .

■ Main Functions and Features
• The various currencies of the world to support .
· Banknotes and coins will be displayed . Simple , easy to understand
· Operation is easy . 
· You can also input from either of the number and amount 
· You can also input of the total amount . It is automatically calculated to banknotes and coins 
· You can enter by cursor movement ,more quickly 

■ method of operation
· Tap the input item of the denomination of the number or amount of money you want to enter.
· Numeric keypad will appear. Press the number, the "DONE" button (iPad is a return) is automatically calculated the total amount of money when you tap.
・The vertical and horizontal movement with the cursor is possible, too. There is completion (DONE), too.
・All input items are removed when you tap a "clear" button.
・Can choose type of currency when you  tap a "setting" button.
・When the number except the unit is input, I display warning. Please correct the amount of money immediately.

※Immunity from responsibility, attention
・I give a perfect test about the calculation, but cannot guarantee it about the damage by the use at all.
・It may not be usable by update in iOS. Please understand it.

Please inform the support site of a request or a question or the malfunction or encouragement

Thank you

name: Baby Supermarket:Grade 1 Math Games-Candy Elementary School:USD Coins Counter,Addition and Subtraction.
description:
Candy Store:1st grade kids learning addition and subtraction facts & coins learning,counting,paying,making change,matching and etc:elementary & primary    math games-children’s professional experience city: money,bill,free!
1¢,2¢,....., oh, how can I count the coin clearly? I'm going to the supermarket to buy candy, and I need $1.99, How to pay for it? Don’t worry! Follow me to the Candy Supermarket. Let’s play a kids math game about coin counter and shopping. Soon you will be able to buy your favorite products happily. 
Welcome to Candy Supermarket,this is kindergarten and 1st grade,2nd grade and 3rd grade kids math games for USD coins counting,coins learning,coins paying,coins making change,coins matching and etc. this's kids math games,they are play  addition and subtraction  games.
Do you like playing math games? If you do, come to candy supermarket and play with GEORGE and ANNA! The kids math game here will make you feel more confident. Ready? Give it a try! Math can be so much fun! 
The funniest mathematical games for children: 
1: They has been tested by many teachers and students and recommended by them;
2: 8 interactive games about USD/EUR/GBP/RMB coins learning, counting, paying, making change, matching and etc.
3: Students can learn coins from different countries. They will win coins by working hard for correct answers;
4: Real shopping games in a supermarket. Hundreds of articles are available there, and children can find what they want;
5: Supermarket games are involved in selecting goods, calculation, payment and change. A real shopping experience.
6: Addition and subtraction-related games will help your children understand additive and subtraction skills.
Candy supermarket is kids Supermarket,it's kindergarten and 1st grade、2nd grade  and 3rd grade math games of elementary school, it's about coins  learning, counting, paying, making change, matching and etc of USD/EUR/GBP/RMB coins and bill; Kids can learning addition and subtraction with money,they can shopping in the supermarket.
Candy Supermarket is a very funny mathematical educational game which can not only help children know and identify coins with different values, but also help them learn calculation, payment and change with coins or bill.
This is a math game designed for kids by a mother with over 20 years of experience in early childhood education. The enlightenment game applies the calculation way of counting to help kids learn the comprehensive calculation of penny,dime and dollar and simulation shopping. As long as the kids can count, they can easily master this game. 
Playful and childish pictures together with a fun and easy, step-by-step learning model help kids grasp the simple counting calculation method. The supermarket simulation shopping game helps kids experience the fun of life and game. The advanced game is added calculations of continuous addition and continuous subtract. 
There are a lot of ways to learn calculation. It’s very helpful for training kids’ thinking, reaction, analysis and operability to let them study math with a variety of calculation methods. Learning by games can help kids maintain interest in math.

name: iDenomiCalcLite
description:
Denomination calculation of Japan is a computer made simply. 
It plays an active part in various scenes, such as the time of payroll calculation, at the time of register settlement of accounts of the compute total amount of the contents of the wallet, a retail store, etc. 
■ Feature 
- An item displays each bill and coin beside an item in a pattern intelligibly. 
- When an item hides with simple operation of only a ten key, and a ten key, it scrolls automatically and can input. 
■ The main functions 
- Both the input from number of sheets and the input from the amount of money can be performed. 
- The contents of work are memorized at the time of an end, and a start-up is also resumed by the same contents next time. 
■ The operation method 
- Carry out a tap (it pushes) to the number-of-sheets item of a denomination (a 10,000 yen bill - a 1 yen coin) to input, or an amount-of-money item at the time. 
- Since a ten key comes out, if the button after inputting a number "Done" is pushed or a tap is carried out to other input items, a ten key will be stored and the sum total will be calculated automatically. 
- If the tap of the "clearance" button is carried out, all the input items will be eliminated. 
- Since warning is displayed when the number which is not a unit of an input bill and a coin is inputted by the input item of the amount of money, please give me correction of the amount of money promptly. 
(* attention: Since I am not doing correction processing automatically, the compute total amount of the amount of money as it is is displayed and carried out.) 
* Notes 
- Although I am doing the test thoroughgoing about calculation, since we do not offer a guarantee at all about the case where trouble should attain to business etc. by a calculation result, please use it after approving of that. 
Please connect with a support site about the words, the question, and fault of demand and encouragement.

name: Thief Adventure - Chest Break Test
description:
Thief Adventure - Chest Break Test  - game application for speed and manual dexterity training in dangerous, but romantic atmosphere of the saloon in the Wild West.

A  piece of paper is waving in the wind on a flaky wall of the saloon. You come closer and read the following announcement: "Attention! Attention! Sheriff's out of town, so a competition among the best breakers will be held in the "Wild Coyote" today. We are waiting for the real professionals in this field who can handle with a lock of any complexity in seconds . The prize fund is not limited - open the chests and get gold from the each one!"

Join this illegal "gold rush" and choose one of the three game modes:
- ARCADE MODE
A great way to earn coins to open the following modes and get tickets for the competition
- LOCKS BREAKING AGAINGS THE CLOCK
Time is your worst enemy. Open chests as fast as if the Devil himself is chasing you
- BREAKING MASTER
Mode for burglary gurus. There is only a counter, indicating the number of opened chests in a row. One failure and you have lost.

Another features of the Thief Adventure - Chest Break Test:
- 2 types of currency: gold coins and tickets for the competition
- breaking the chests with swiping - new burglary technique
- atmosphere of a gangster saloon in the Wild West
- receiving coins and tickets for the each chest you have opened

name: Japanese Money Counter DX
description:
Easy to count  money.
( for Japanese bills and coins )

マネーカウンターDXでお金の集計をぱぱっと片付けちゃいましょう！
硬貨、紙幣の数量を入力するだけで、瞬時に合計が計算できます。
小口現金の管理、金種表の作成などにお役立て下さい!
◎iPadバージョン「マネーカウンターHD」もございます◎

【おすすめポイント】
・１画面の中に見やすさと使いやすさを追求したユーザーインターフェイスをデザインしました！
・数量の微調整のための、+１、-１キーが作業効率をアップ！
・束(紙幣)、本(硬貨)にも対応しています!
・結果データ（CSVファイル）をメールで送信できます！

【使い方は簡単です】
・入力する紙幣または硬貨をタップして選んで下さい。
・テンキーで数量を入力して下さい。
・リアルタイムで合計金額が計算されます。
※束/本は999、バラは9999まで入力できます。
※1束は100枚、1本は50枚として計算します。
・下1ケタの修正には、「←」（デリート）キー
・束/本とバラを個別のクリアには、「C1」キー(Ver.1.1)
・各紙幣、硬貨の束/本とバラ両方のクリアには、「C2」キー(Ver.1.1)
・全ての数量をゼロにするには、「AC」キー
・束/本とバラ入力の切り替えは入力エリアのタップまたは、「束本」キーと「枚」キー
・金種の切り替えは入力エリアのタップまたは、「↓」「↑」キーで移動できます。


◎お願い◎
ご意見ご質問などは、App Storeのカスタマレビューに投稿する前に、まずサポートメールまたはTwitter(@NZW31)へお気軽にお問い合わせ下さい。
App Storeのカスタマレビューに対して開発側から直接お返事できないため問題解決ができません。
お手数ですがよろしくお願いいたします。


免責事項
本アプリ開発者は、本アプリの利用によって発生したあらゆる損失・損害について一切の責任を負いません。
本アプリのご利用につきましては、利用者自身の責任によって行って頂くようお願い致します。

name: Money Counter Pro
description:
Money Counter Pro is a simple App to count your currency notes and coins of various denomination.
Separate Counter for all major currencies, such as US Dollars (USD) ,Euros, British Pound (GBP), Australian Dollar(AUD), Canadian Dollar (CAD), Indian Rupee (INR), Norwegian Krone (NOK), Swiss Franc (CHF), Japanese Yen (JPY), Chinese Yuan Renminbi (CNY), Swedish Krona (SEK), South African Rand (ZAR), Mexican Peso, Brazilian Real, Russian Rouble (RUB), New Zealand Dollar (NZD) etc
It's a handy tool to count your money, wherever you are in the world.

Useful at billing, banking counters and for sales persons.

Available in major Languages

name: Countzilla
description:
Free unlimited counters. Toss virtual coins. Roll virtual dice.

People who play board games or go out with friends can now use their phones to keep score and make random decisions. Countzilla combines score keeping and random choice selection in one app. When playing board games, you can add the players and keep score. When making decisions like deciding whose turn it is to pay for coffee, Countzilla guarantees that everyone gets a fair chance--even if there are volunteers.

Customers have found that Countzilla helps keeps peace in their marriage by keeping track of who is right more often, tracking chores, or simply breaking ties in an argument. It is an indispensable tool for life.

Explorers use Countzilla to try new ideas. Explore a restaurant you have not visited in a while. Meet up with friends you have not seen in a while. Decide whether or not to buy those shoes or that watch.

Countzilla simplifies many of life's tough choices by applying principled decision theory and mathematics, ensuring that you make rational choices, in the limit.

name: Deckmaster
description:
Deckmaster is the most intuitive and powerful way to manage your Magic: the Gathering card collection.  Price cards and decks, set up trades and wish lists, and visualize your collection like never before!  Put your entire trade binder in your pocket!

This app is designed to answer the following common questions:
• How much is my collection worth?
• How much is this card worth?
• What are the cards I want to trade for?
• What is the mana curve for this deck?
• Is this deck properly balanced?
• How can I simply and clearly track life?
• How can I easily print proxies?
• Is this card legal in Standard/Modern/Commander?

Features:
• NO in-app purchases, subscription fees, or annoying ads!
• Intuitive and usable interface
• Get support and help right from within the app

Manage your collection:
• View cards as thumbnails, lists, or as-fan
• Unlimited number of containers and decks and include sideboards and maybe boards
• Move cards between containers and decks just as you’d move the physical cards (no loss of information when moving cards)
• Add personal notes to individual cards and containers
• Deck box creator allows you to style deck boxes in thousands of combinations
• Booster pack and Booster Box images to accurately represent your collection and pulls
• Import decklists in a variety of formats including Magic Online format
• Tap and hold cards to rearrange however you want

Search for a card:
• Includes all promo and token cards!
• Powerful search allows filtering by set, type, rarity, color, and more
• Full text search searches oracle text and even artist names
• Search all cards or just the cards in your collection

Get information:
• Quickly price cards and decks and even your entire collection!
• Beautiful high-resolution card art
• Download card, pricing, and images for offline use on iPod touches and to save cellular data charges
• Get mana curve and mana base visualizations
• Granular sort allows sorting results by color, rarity, type, set, cost, and more
• Test your decks with shake-to-shuffle
• Get oracle text and gatherer rulings and quickly look up card in Gatherer

Set up fair trades:
• Quickly set up trades to make sure a trade is fair
• See which cards you’re looking for across your collection
• Mark cards as foil and specify condition for accurate pricing and valuation

Augment your game:
• Beautifully simple easy to use life counter
• Coin flipper to quickly flip and see the results of multiple coin flips (Ral Zarek eat your heart out!)
• Easily print proxies for a deck or just cards you’re missing or want
• Export decklists to a variety of formats including Magic Online and Cockatrice

We have priced our app differently because we wanted to create a quality and full-featured app that didn't require nickel and dining people with in-app purchases. We wanted one awesome app you could buy once and wouldn't have to continue paying for. We may have to change that model in the future but we hope that won’t be necessary. Besides, we think this app is worth way more, and is a much better value than a holiday gift box or a single tournament entry!

Obviously we could use some help some marketing the app.  If you’re good at graphic design and you’d like to help us market, we’ll give you a free promo code for the app!  Send some sample work and ideas to pr@kudit.com for details.

We have lots of awesome features planned to come as well!  You won’t want to miss out on new ways to play, trade, and draft your cards!

name: FindCircles
description: Find Circles is the incorporation of the Hough Circle algorithm into iOS devices.  Designed for iPhone and iPad, this app will detect, mark, and count circles from an image.  From pills on a countertop, coins on a table, and cells on a microscopic slide.  Find Circles is a crucial tool where repetitive counting is necessary.  Using OpenCV to allow the computer to 'see', Find Circles is fully adjustable to fit a wide variety of tasks.    It uses multiple phases of image processing to achieve this task.  What used to require a mainframe to run, now can be run on your device.  Use the same algorithm factories have been using since the 80's to count inventory.

name: iSalvadanaio
description:
During Christmas iSalvadanaio will be completely free !!!!
Merry Christmas !!!
download it now

****************REPORTING *************** 
Some users have identified a bug that does not allow the proper functioning after the upgrade. Waiting for a fix, please delete and reinstall the app.
This will allow you to launch the app regularly.
I apologize for the inconvenience.
************************************************

How many times, seeing your piggy bank you have thought "how much money will there be inside?"
iSalvadanaio is the app that will answer to this big question!

Just keep it updated, putting the same coin or bill you put in your real piggy bank, in the iSalvadanaio piglet and you're done!

*************** NOTE **************** 
You must only DRAG the coin or bill and drop it on the piggy bank.
*************************************

iSalvadanaio  will show a statistic of all the coins or banknotes inserted divided by value.

Want to start a piggy bank to buy something you want?

Set your target and constantly iSalvadanaio will tell you what is missing in order to attain and will alert you as soon as you arrive to the amount!

In addition, each entry will sound different from time to time, for example, if the piggy bank is empty or not.

Just then shake iSalvadanaio and feel that your iPhone is full of coins!

It can also be a nice game to bring the children to the 'first pennies'!

What are you waiting? The collection begins!

*************** SUPPORT **************** 
Before placing negative reviews, please contact me on mail address apps@matteolucario.it.
I will be happy to answer your questions.
Thanks to all!
****************************************

name: ShowAngel-ios
description:
This app helps people to improve the efficiency of counting out a sum of money. When some one has too many coins or notes to count, use this app will save time.
The one who has many coins or notes to count out can use this app especially bus company, bank, store and so on.


1) How to use this app?

Function 1: Counting Coins
First, put some coins on a platform such as a desktop.The platform is black color or any other dark color.
Second, run the app.On the top left corner of the app's interface, there is a button (circular shape), touch it.
Third, chose "camera" in the pop up dialog. And then, take a photo of the coins on the platform.
The last step, on the top left corner of the app's interface will show the number of the coins. Each coin will be marked by green circular.

Function 2: Counting Notes
First, put some coins on a platform such as a desktop. One on top of another, reveal boxers.
Second, On the top right corner of the app's interface, there is a button (like a paper), touch it.
Third, chose "camera" in the pop up dialog. And then, take a photo of the notes. (As far as possible to make every border of the notes is parallel to the top border of the photo.)
The last step, on the top right corner of the app's interface will show the number of the notes. Each note’s border will be marked by green circular.


2) What currency format does the app accept?

It accept circular shape coins. Any country or any face value.


3) Is the number the amount of currency or the number of bills?

The number is the amount of currency.


Note:
When users found that not all the coins or notes are marked by the green circulars,please touch the button "+" and touch the picture to mark them. 
Also, when users found that some green circulars are not mark on the coins or notes, please touch the button "x" and touch the picture to unmark them.

name: Thief Adventure - Chest Break Test PRO
description:
Thief Adventure - Chest Break Test  - game application for speed and manual dexterity training in dangerous, but romantic atmosphere of the saloon in the Wild West.

A  piece of paper is waving in the wind on a flaky wall of the saloon. You come closer and read the following announcement: "Attention! Attention! Sheriff's out of town, so a competition among the best breakers will be held in the "Wild Coyote" today. We are waiting for the real professionals in this field who can handle with a lock of any complexity in seconds . The prize fund is not limited - open the chests and get gold from the each one!"

Join this illegal "gold rush" and choose one of the three game modes:
- ARCADE MODE
A great way to earn coins to open the following modes and get tickets for the competition
- LOCKS BREAKING AGAINGS THE CLOCK
Time is your worst enemy. Open chests as fast as if the Devil himself is chasing you
- BREAKING MASTER
Mode for burglary gurus. There is only a counter, indicating the number of opened chests in a row. One failure and you have lost.

Another features of the Thief Adventure - Chest Break Test:
- 2 types of currency: gold coins and tickets for the competition
- breaking the chests with swiping - new burglary technique
- atmosphere of a gangster saloon in the Wild West
- receiving coins and tickets for the each chest you have opened
